name: xustosapi
description: A sample Node.js app using Express 4

scripts.predeploy: tar cvf - node_modules | tar xvf - -C dist/js
scripts.package:dev: aws --profile xustosdev cloudformation package --template-file cfn/master.yaml --output-template-file dist/master-output.yaml --s3-bucket com-xustos-xustosapi-dev
scripts.package:prod: aws --profile xustosprod cloudformation package --template-file cfn/master.yaml --output-template-file dist/master-output.yaml --s3-bucket com-xustos-xustosapi-prod
scripts.deploy:dev: aws --profile xustosdev cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/master-output.yaml --stack-name xustosapidev --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.deploy:prod: aws --profile xustosprod cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/master-output.yaml --stack-name xustosapiprod --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM

author: Francois Gauthier
